fields.description:
with imaging worker VM version:

eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.168.140514gitade8080.el6.x86_64.rpm

and the paravirt image from:

http://emis.eucalyptus.com/starter-emis/euca-centos6.4-ec2user-2013.07.12-x86_64.tgz

and image upload/registration command (note, renamed initramfs file to initrd to get euca-install-image to upload/reg the ramdisk)

euca-install-image -i kvm-kernel/vmlinuz-2.6.32-358.11.1.el6.x86_64 -n emis-centos6-kernel -r x86_64 -b emis-centos6-bucket
euca-install-image -i kvm-kernel/initrd-2.6.32-358.11.1.el6.x86_64.img -n emis-centos6-initrd -r x86_64 -b emis-centos6-bucket
euca-install-image -i euca-centos6.4-ec2user-2013.07.12-x86_64.img --kernel eki-cc88fca9 --ramdisk eri-3b8d34ca -n emis-centos6 -r x86_64 -b emis-centos6-bucket

when I attempt to run the instance, I see the below in the worker.log on the imaging worker VM.  There are two issues:

1) it fails as shown below
2) the imaging worker VM is leaving loopback and device mapper entries around which use up space (even through the backing files are unlinked):

{code}
